title: Homeopathy
description: Homeopathy is a gentle, effective, non-toxic form of medicine and is valuable for treating many symptoms created by the stress and toxicity of daily life.
cleaned_text: Homeopathy is a natural form of medicine that was invented more than 200 years ago by a German doctor named Samuel Hahnemann. Benefits of Homeopathy - Homeopathic remedies are made from natural ingredients. - Homeopathy can be used alongside other medication. - They are free of side effects. How remedies are made Homeopathic remedies are made from a range of natural substances such as minerals and plants. Each remedy is made from a small amount of a material which is crushed, diluted and shaken. This process is repeated a specific number of times to release the healing energy.
